entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7 except minus 12 inland. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
